entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.8
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 094a7092b0e06facfd157558f16596961466dbba: fix: remove date check for auth token, always refresh #481 (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 67598612e88a24026da3a4c456c2acbc1172c9a0: update deps (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.9
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • a8d08db78fdb57dbb84491e2a274e4f118bb34dc: fix: countdown not reset properly (@seriousm4x)
  • 7b4c18ac498c4a916fb01d5324957df134740ead: fix: cronjobs not working correctly #506 (@seriousm4x)
  • ce9e27d70bfe6bcf5e795669db5554309f475b96: fix: possible solution for #506 (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 1a4de72094e3813293fd27a90781a9066ef893d5: update deps (@seriousm4x)
  • 5ebdecbe4847d0d5d0bed9062181d0961318a1e4: add 'colorful' theme by @Raulmora22 #540 (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.10
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
Docker image is now based on Alpine 3.20. If you use custom alpine packages, make sure they exist in Alpine 3.20.

Changelog

  • 5ec6ebbbc539f0cfafd722c149963bdb21a0d6de: remove crowdin (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • 1b7daaafbd5c4b52c5408bb1ac6aaf749d08e561: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 1db61ce7f7d12dba393a2ced25127334230883ae: go-dep: bump golang.org/x/sys from 0.19.0 to 0.20.0 in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • c3bec18bf0c74e26793c120c8b8ba14eb02de416: go-dep: update (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.11
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • b8642ee6c35659f842374869d1cb36234b21377a: added zh-TW (@TWTom041)

Bug fixes

  • 864935b3b359b7fd3fb49618574dd2ab83c4ab8a: fix: add zh-TW for date-fns on DeviceCard (@seriousm4x)
  • 949e391549f784d67fb55a387171b984cb143065: fix: inherit from base zh (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 6a76a38a59d988a97bb2dd3245a4fb4402e42b2c: Merge branch 'pr/623' (@seriousm4x)
  • 31231bac1fb17c766986bf15009b6d4cf73cdafb: update deps, fix vul https://github.com/seriousm4x/UpSnap/security/dependabot/21 (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.2.12
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 3121f27d25f70006284373b816af8047df9ac0d2: feat: add italian language (Merge pull request #631 from aviscido/i18n-add-it) (@seriousm4x)

Bug fixes

  • 15fcda8a5a7d108ee4ea15d6ed56bd74f9104a53: fix: change netmask placeholder (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 9268c9ee6872f34c6b3eee1f3d9d6f8ce0460de1: First half translation done ( <>)
  • a8b976536dacb9598331747c623355c97f8638a8: Fixed a small typo (@aviscido)
  • 6c8a145f0ac174588c31bc1d5f697e5ebce1445a: Merge pull request #647 from aviscido/patch-1 (@seriousm4x)
  • b7251a33139d1817e67b330c46d0c7263d2f5e86: Translation to Italian language added. (@aviscido)
  • e6b8176fffc3d8cd0c7f13528cf320333a5678fb: Update README.md (@aviscido)
  • c522fc9d7f710b28a01bef10ef6af78040cf297c: add Chinese (Taiwan) (@seriousm4x)
